General.Name: Jiangsu Linyang Energy Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Linyang Energy Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies electric energy meters, and system products and accessories in China and internationally. It offers smart energy meters, power consumption management products, micro-grid and energy storage systems, and distribution automation system solutions and products, as well as power system operation and maintenance services. The company also provides air-cooled and liquid-cooled battery components, smart energy routers, energy storage integrated energy management systems, smart string system solutions, and distributed microgrid solutions. In addition, it engages in the investment, construction, and operation of approximately1.4GW of photovoltaic power plants. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Linyang Electronics Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Linyang Energy Co., Ltd. in December 2015. Jiangsu Linyang Energy Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Qidong, China.
General.Address: Qidong Economic Development Zone, Qidong, China, 226200
